[[Image:Sagan om ringen 1959.png: *'''Subject(s):''' Tolkien disliked the cover illustration of the Swedish translation of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' (''[[Härskarringen
thumb: Sagan om ringen]]'', 1st Swedish edition [[1959]]).<ref>Johan Olin, [http://twitter.com/ardamir Ardamir (Twitter)], tweets from 9 December and 17 December 2011</ref>
